page.title: 13One day in 1985 _ T.Newman
page.content: {7.15a.m.}Got up.{7.30a.m.}Ate breakfast{8.00a.m.}Got washed and dressed{8.10a.m.}Made my bed.{8.20a.m. Mum did my hair.{8.25a.m.}Got ready to go to school.{8.30a.m.}Went to school. {8.35a.m.}Called for Alice on my way to school.{8.40a.m.}Crossed Loughborough Road with the Lollipop Lady(School Crossing Patrol).{8.45a.m.}Got to school at last.{8.55a.m.}Class register was called.{9.00a.m.}Assembly in the Hall.{9.48a.m.}Wrote a piece of writing about a ruined castle.{ {10.33a.m. }Story groups(I listened to "Foxbusters" by Dick King-Smith){ {10.45a.m.}Playtime{11.00a.m.}Practical area time.{12.00noon}I stayed for lunch at school and we had our packed lunches outside on the grass under the horse chestnut tree on the far side of the school playground. *The afternoon/evening is on page 14*
